home.description: This is still a work in progress. Navigate below or via the menu.

app.description: This app is a pet project of mine. I don't like having to search around for guides, so I put them in one place. I will also be adding some utilities over time.

paragraphs: I wish I could just ask "What's your level?", but alas, there are too many variables. Science research, alliance buffs, etc... It's easier for you to enter numbers here.

sections.heading: What Does This Tool Do?
paragraphs: This calculator helps you maximize your Unit Progression event score while using the LEAST number of speedups possible. It tells you exactly how many units to train and when to use speedups to open all reward boxes efficiently.
You can also use this tool to determine how many units to queue up so training completes exactly when you need it.

me.title: About Satch (#1532 Satchmohpoclies)
me.FIRST_FACT: I started Last War: Survival on Apr 29th 2025. I got kicked out of an alliance and got picked up by MMMP. I am a low spender. I try to use math to beat the whales.
OTHER_FACTS: I was born in Cleveland and grew up in Ft. Lauderdale, FL.
I cooked in restaurants for 15 years until Covid closed down. I went back to school and got my BS in Computer Science.
I still don't know who let the dogs out.

cookies.title: Cookie Notice
cookies.message: This site uses essential cookies to store your preferences and settings locally. I do not use any tracking, analytics, or marketing cookies. Your data stays on your device.
